QuestData.Title: Slay them all!
QuestData.Description: Welcome to Wintergrasp, $n. Warlord Garrosh demands one thing: Slay them all!$B$BReturn to me when ten of the strongest members of the Alliance are dead.
QuestData.LogDescription: Commander Dardosh in Wintergrasp wants you to slay 10 members of the Alliance.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, have you completed your mission?
